scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:js:routes && npm run build:js:tile
scripts.generate: yarn run generate-library && yarn run generate-scrapper && yarn run generate-organizer
scripts.generate-library: akala sdk generate dist/server/commands/library library.json --name library
scripts.generate-metadata-library: akala sdk generate-metadata library.json src/library.ts --name library
scripts.generate-scrapper: akala sdk generate dist/server/commands/scrapper/ scrapper.json --name scrapper
scripts.generate-metadata-scrapper: akala sdk generate-metadata scrapper.json src/scrapper.ts --name scrapper
scripts.generate-organizer: akala sdk generate dist/server/commands/organizer/ organizer.json --name organizer
scripts.generate-metadata-organizer: akala sdk generate-metadata organizer.json src/organizer.ts --name organizer
